result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial/scheduling conference on November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:03 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Ryan Richard White in court.  Attorney Michael R. Cohen in court for Ryan Richard White. Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin.  Atty Cohen has not reviewed the Information at this time however will proceed with ARGN today as INFO mirrors the complaint. Atty Cohen requests to proceed to ARGN For case 22CF292. Court calls 22CF208 and 22CF292. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Def pleads Not Guilty on both cases. Atty Cohen updates the court. Def has pending charges in another county and request time to address those cases as well. Court schedules during block on 11/10/22. Court approves zoom appearances.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Supplemental Demand for Discovery and Inspection. Filed by Atty Cohen. km

Arraignment on July 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Michael R. Cohen   DF:  Ryan Richard White appeared. Case called at 8:33 a.m. Court notes this matter is set for a status conference. Atty Cohen is requesting a wavier of preliminary hearing today and schedule for arraignment. DE has another file in Branch 3. ADA Ellenwood in agreement. Court schedules. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing. DE understands and waives right to preliminary hearing.   Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Zoom approved. Atty Cohen has prior hearing in Branch 3. Court adjourned at 8:37 a.m.  Arraignment scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Filed by ADA Ellenwood. km
Status conference on June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Michael R. Cohen   DF:  Ryan Richard White appeared. Case called at 8:52 a.m. Court notes this matter is set for a status conference. Atty Cohen has just been retained. Has a copy of complaint. Waives further reading. Waives time limits. Requesting another status conference. Court schedules. Court adjourned at 8:55 a.m.  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on April 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood. Ryan Richard White pro se. Case called at 11:02 a.m. Court notes this matter is set for a status conference. DE has a meeting set up after Court to meet with private counsel. Court will schedule for another hearing to check on the status of counsel. DE given PFAC. Address confirmed. Court finds good cause for exceeding time limits for purposes of appointment of counsel. Court adjourned at 11:04 a.m.  Status conference scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Status conference on April 4, 2022 at 11:00 am.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY: Kaitlin Dippolito and Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Ryan Richard White appeared from jail via video. DE has a copy of complaint. Address and DOB confirmed. Understands charges and penalties. Atty Dippolito states DE does not qualify for PD services. Given PFAC. PD will assist for today. ADA Ellenwood states DE has another pending OWI in another county. DE will hire private counsel. Court schedules for a status conference.  Status conference scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 11:00 am.
